column1: This example illustrating NASA Ames file format index 4010 is entirely fictitious.
Data have been made up for the purpose of illustrating the use of the format. They
consist in an imaginary calculated temperature distribution over a longitude-lati-
tude-altitude grid at 6 o'clock and noon on the 21st of June 1980. The grid is

column4: 12 and 13. Longitude ranges from 30 degrees West to 30

The files included in this data set illustrate each of the 9 NASA Ames file format
